attributes.title: Very disappointed
attributes.review: This app not only took almost all day to download, but when I opened it, it immediately crashed my phone, I lost all my photos in the process. This is not how the presidents own app should function, very poor quality.

attributes.title: trump asked for my number ???
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see how our beloved president was doing. but when I tried to use the app, I was asked for my phone number!!! I am so grossed out that the president, who is 74 years old, is asking for my number!!! I am only 18!! and trump is married! I am so disgusted.
